turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I would like to order a Cappuccino from the Starbucks located at 148 NJ-73, Voorhees Township, NJ 08043

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what kind of milk would you like your Cappuccino made with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How does coconut milk sound?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So a Cappuccino with coconut milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Cappuccino would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What's their largest size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The largest size would be a Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, a Venti it is than!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any special toppings such as caramel with your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Caramel sound's nice!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! So a Cappuccino venti made with coconut milk with a caramel topping. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that would be all. You can place the order with it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'm placing your order right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm waiting for confirmation from the Starbucks located in Vorhees, NJ.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has successfully gone through and is now ready for pick up at the Starbucks located at 148 NJ-73, Voorhees Township, NJ 08043. A digital receipt has been sent to your phone via text message.
